pkgmetadata.longdescription: Sentiment Analysis for Text, Image and Video using Transformer Models // Implements sentiment analysis using huggingface https://huggingface.co transformer zero-shot classification model pipelines for text and image data. The default text pipeline is Cross-Encoder's DistilRoBERTa https://huggingface.co/cross-encoder/nli-distilroberta-base and default image/video pipeline is Open AI's CLIP https://huggingface.co/openai/clip-vit-base-patch32. All other zero-shot classification model pipelines can be implemented using their model name from https://huggingface.co/models?pipeline_tag=zero-shot- classification.
